bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition referred to only in the Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 and Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 . Its meaning remains unclear. The context suggests an ulcerous condition with red skin, swelling, heat and pain. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry bai jiang 敗醬：主暴熱，火瘡赤氣，疥瘙疽痔 , “It controls violent heat, fire sores with red qi , jie -illness, itching, impediment-illness, and piles”.
